ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.
M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported
1 = Parent; 2 = Teacher; 3=Self; 4= Other; 5= Significant other; 6 = Parent 1; 7 = Parent 2; 999 = Not available
1 = Mother; 2 = Father; 3 = Other relative or custodial adult; 4 = Teacher or caregiver; 5 = Other specialist; 6 = Other; 7 = Child; 8= Spouse; 999 = Not available

-1.5 = Pre-Screening; -1 = Screening; 0 = Baseline; ## = Visit ## (from 1 to 10); Whole numbers = standard monthly visits; #.001 - #.009 = Unscheduled; #.1 = End of Phase 1; #.2 = End of Phase 2; #.3 = End of Phase 3; #.4 = End of Open Choice Phase; #.5 = End of Study; #.6 = Genetic Analysis; 1000=all visits

ElementDescription: At this moment, how important is it that you change your (P: current parenting practices)/(A: your academic habits)?
Notes: 0 = Not Important At All; 5 = About As Important As Other Things In My Life Right Now; 10 = Most Important Thing In My Life Right Now

ElementDescription: At this moment, how confident are you that you will change your your (P: current parenting practices)/(A: your academic habits)?
Notes: 0 = Not Confident At All; 5 = 50% Confident; 10 = 100% Confident

ElementDescription: Staff code number of person completing this form
How likely are you are to use alcohol, even a little, while you are still pregnant?
Notes: 0 = Not at all likely ; 10 = Very likely

ElementDescription: How confident are you that you could avoid alcohol completely for the rest of your pregnancy, if you really wanted to? If you already made a quit goal, how confident are you that you will be successful with your goal?
Notes: 0 = Not confident at all ; 10 = Very confident

ElementDescription: When a pregnant woman drinks alcohol, how much could it hurt the baby?
How ready are you to quit drinking alcohol, completely for the rest of your pregnancy?
Notes: 0 = Not ready at all ; 10 = Very ready

ElementDescription: How ready are you to quit drinking alcohol, completely and forever?
Notes: 0 = Not ready at all ; 10 = Completely ready
